Text: I'm a fan of B-movies but this one takes the cake, not only is there terrible acting, the sun bathing scenes were ridiculous.  Nobody in their right mind sun bathes half arched.  And only one scene of bare breasts.  The gore wasn't even that great, if you're gonna make a bad movie, at least give the viewers something to keep them interested.  Overall, it gets a 6 out of 10 and I'm being generous.  That is all.
